mapper.select: SELECT a.id AS id, a.type, a.tdate AS startime, a.comment, b.register, b.repairman, b.tdate, b.result, b.explain, c.name, c.location, c.lamp_pole_num AS polenumber, d.client_code AS code FROM b_client_fault AS a LEFT JOIN b_client_repair AS b ON a.id = b.b_client_fault_id LEFT JOIN c_client_attr1 AS c ON a.c_client_id = c.id LEFT JOIN c_client AS d ON c.c_client_id = d.id WHERE a.id = #{id ,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update: UPDATE b_client_repair AS a SET a.register =#{register}, a.repairman =#{repairman}, a.tdate =#{tdate}, a.result =#{result}, a.explain =#{explain} WHERE a.b_client_fault_id =#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into b_client_repair ( b_client_fault_id, register, repairman, tdate, result, b_client_repair.`explain` ) values ( #{id}, #{register}, #{repairman}, #{tdate}, #{result}, #{explain} )

mapper.select:
SELECT a.c_gateway_id AS id, a.name, a.location, a.comment, a.staus AS status, count(c.c_client_id) as number, b.gateway_code AS code FROM c_gateway_attr1 AS a LEFT JOIN c_gateway AS b ON a.c_gateway_id = b.id LEFT JOIN c_client_gateway AS c ON a.c_gateway_id = c.c_gateway_id
WHERE a.c_gateway_type_id = 3
AND c.sys_user_id in ${pd.userids}
AND a.name LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.name}), '%')
AND b.gateway_code LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{pd.code}), '%')
group by c.c_gateway_id
